    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82229</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Needs and wants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Benötigt und wünscht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">A besoin et veut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Necessita e quer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ha bisogno di e desidera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρειάζεται και θέλει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Necesita y desea</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations that differentiate between needs and wants. This illustration shows a boy who wants a branded pair of shoes.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">needs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shoes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sustainable development</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wants</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die zwischen 
Notwendigkeiten unterscheiden und wünscht. Diese Abbildung 
zeigt einen Jungen, der ein eingebranntes Paar Schuhe wünscht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations qui différencient 
entre les besoins et veut. Cette illustration montre un garçon 
qui veut une paire marquée de chaussures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que se 
diferenciam entre necessidades e quer. Esta ilustração mostra 
um menino que queira um par marcado das sapatas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
differenziano fra i bisogni e desidera. Questa illustrazione 
mostra un ragazzo che desidera un accoppiamento bollato dei pattini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που διαφοροποιούν μεταξύ των 
αναγκών και θέλουν. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα αγόρι
που θέλει ένα μαρκαρισμένο ζευγάρι των παπουτσιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que distingan entre 
las necesidades y desea. Esta ilustración muestra a muchacho 
que desea un par calificado de zapatos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Notwendigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schuhe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
